resources.string: Splash screen of Call Journal Android app

Welcome to the Agent Call Journal! This app is purposed in helping you become a top producer, by removing any barriers between you and the calls you must make - the calls that make your business the envy of other agents in your region.

It\'s the digital equivalent of a box of index cards with your contacts\' name on them, that you move to the back of the pile each time you contact them... \n\n... except that it\'s awesome,and a box of index cards isn\'t. Neither is writing updates on them.

Get contacts from your phone, or enter manually, and organize them into lists .... FSBO,Open House Guest,Expireds,or make your own list to suite your needs. The Lite Version of the app affords you up to 25 contacts. The Pro version gives you unlimited contacts.

After each call, recode a Voice Note for yourself - brief audio recordings that keep you hand free to \"put out fires\" or \"juggle cats\" or whatever other business jargon you might have to attend to.
Additional features will be explained through similar dialogue, within the app, so let\'s get started.
\"The few who do are the envy of the many who only watch\" \n Jim Rohn

You have everything you need to
build something for bigger than yourself.

Seth Godin
Here\'s a few options to help familiarize yourself with the app, or answer any question you may have
Post a question to. our \nFacebook page
Become a Pro! That\'s why we do what we do-to be the best we can be. To grow. To thrive. An edge on the competition doesn\'n hurt either...

Thank you for using the Lite Version of MyAgent Call Jounal, Which allows you to have up to 25 contacts in your Contact Manager. When you become a Pro, you will enjoy unlimited potential to grow your business.All you have to do is make those contacts...
Lists help you organize the calls you make.Focus on friends,open house guest,FSBOs,vendors,or make your own list to suit your needs.
Tap and Hold for additional options
This is one of those buttons you don\'t want to press until you know what is\'s going to do, so...
I figured as much. So by selecting "Sync Contacts," you will update the contact information in the app, based on the latest contact information your phone
Would you like to update the contacts in this app based on changes to the contacts in you phone?
Periodically, you\'ll update a contact in your phone, but who wants to do that twice?
You know the drill - if you\'re not writing your goals down, what you really have is a wish. Here\'s a good way to hold yourself accountable for your phone calls
"An average person with average talent, ambition and education can outstrip the most brilliant genius in our society, if that person has clear, focused goals." Brian Tracy
Your contact manager will allow you to import some or all of the contacts directly from your phone, or you have the option to manually enter contacts that you don\'t keep in your phone
How would you like to add contacts?
Lists help you organize the calls you make. Focus on friends, open house guests, FSBOs, vendors, or make your own list to suit your needs.
What list would you like to populate from the contacts you are about to select from your phone?
Choose a list from the menu
Just populate the overall call list
